{
    "average_tip": 1.2343877749659334,
    "average_tippees": 3,
    "escrow": 56318.53,
    "last_thursday": "last Thursday",
    "nach": "317",
    "nactive": 1851,
    "ncc": 1584,
    "ngivers": 1193,
    "noverlap": 328,
    "nreceivers": 986,
    "other_people": "three other people",
    "pcc": "  7.7",
    "punc": ".",
    "statements": [
        {
            "statement": "writing web apps (some free and open source) and giving talks at local user groups. I'm currently founding a local user group for JavaScript devs (HartfordJS).",
            "username": "willklein"
        },
        {
            "statement": "Providing better services for medical industry!",
            "username": "sivajankan"
        },
        {
            "statement": "supporting the proliferation and unfettered access of knowledge as an essential mechanism in the pursuit of just society. ",
            "username": "wrought"
        },
        {
            "statement": "creating and sharing Moodle theme's that help make it look more engaging and professional. If you like my themes and want to support me in making more, I'm always open to assistance.\n\nI also accept Beer and chocolate!\n\nJulian (@Moodleman) Ridden",
            "username": "moodleman"
        },
        {
            "statement": "Promoting FLOSS with my Linux use and attempting to entertain the world with great games!",
            "username": "dabbertorres"
        },
        {
            "statement": "publishing News about Art and Culture, promoting Artists of all kinds. \n\nOur funding goal is to collect donations for needy Artists. \n\nFor Authors we publish free of charge on \nhttp://www.pressenet.info/ \n\nContact us: \nhttp://www.pressenet.info/kontakt.html\n\n\n\n",
            "username": "pressenet"
        },
        {
            "statement": "fostering caring for animals without homes till they find their forever home and also by offering free web development work to charities.\n\n I am currently also volunteering as a marketing manager & publicist for the Sydney Intercultural film festival promoting cultural diversity in film and media. check out www.siff.org.au",
            "username": "cordiervoodoo"
        },
        {
            "statement": "making tools to make development easier.",
            "username": "fjolnir"
        },
        {
            "statement": "contributing to open source projects like Composer, phpBB, Symfony, Doctrine and many more.",
            "username": "naderman"
        },
        {
            "statement": "giving developers an easy way to compare JavaScript MV* frameworks, through projects like TodoMVC and upcoming larger efforts like TasteJS and TasteStack.\n\nAny tips earned will be used to fund stickers, t-shirts and swag as a thank you to developers making significant open-source contributions back to our projects.",
            "username": "tastejs"
        },
        {
            "statement": "writing software, mostly in javascript, and giving it away. I am far more likely to donate here than to receive, but hey, if you find my work helpful, go for it.",
            "username": "ceejbot"
        },
        {
            "statement": "writing and correcting the code in opensource projects..",
            "username": "sadfuzzy"
        },
        {
            "statement": "Software Developer who is driven by innovation and help others new technology",
            "username": "AbhiLegend"
        },
        {
            "statement": "creating tools for JavaScript developers that improve user experience and life.\n\nCurrently I am working on adaptive components for AngularJS https://github.com/angular-adaptive\n\nI am creator of Gyrocopter - gyroscope simulator for Chrome browser https://github.com/janantala/Gyrocopter\n\nI am also developing applications for non profit organization United https://github.com/OZ-United",
            "username": "janantala"
        },
        {
            "statement": "creating Applications and tools for developers, give lessons for beginners ,participation in conferences and web meetings to exchange information.\n\nI also run a local group to help the beginner in the implementation of their ideas and their applications in fact.",
            "username": "Medhat"
        },
        {
            "statement": "putting the \"fun\" in \"i put the 'fun' in 'i put the `fun` in `i put the *fun* in *recursive functions are bullshit*`'\"",
            "username": "gjtorikian"
        }
    ],
    "this_thursday": "this Thursday",
